.sticky-container{position:relative;height:100%}.sticky-container&gt;.content{position:relative}.sticky-container&gt;.content.top{position:fixed;top:0}.sticky-container&gt;.content.bottom{position:absolute;bottom:0}
.trustpilot-widget.tp-carousel-widget{min-height:135px;padding:24px 0 0}
.floating-button{box-shadow:3px 2px 7px 1px #635b67;width:160px;border-radius:30px}.floating-button-container{position:fixed;left:50%;width:160px;bottom:24px;margin-left:-80px;z-index:100}.floating-button-logo{position:relative;top:24px;left:-12px;width:30px}.floating-button-logo .logo-image{background:#3c3241;width:25px;height:25px;padding:6px;border-radius:18px}
